Details

ImplicitAction announcement filter. This is applied just before text from an action routine is output to ensure than any pending implicit action reports are output before any text from the action routine itself. `class `**`ImplicitActionFilter`**` :   `[`OutputFilter`](../object/OutputFilter.html)
